column4: hey UI am on slackware, now I want to have those packages downloaded https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/gtk2hs/0.10.1-3ubuntu2/+build/1320224 what command I shouyld use to acces this repostiory ?
slackware isn't designed to use apt, which is the package tool used by ubuntu and debian
so the repositories will not be compatible
I can use an converter ... just tell me how to do ..erght
